Name: Chari-Baguirmi
Description: Chari-Baguirmi is located in the central part of Chad and is one of the country s key agricultural areas, with fertile land for farming and livestock.

Name: Guéra
Description: Guéra is located in central Chad and is known for its desert and semi-desert landscapes. The region also has some agricultural activity, especially in irrigated areas.

Name: Hadjer-Lamis
Description: Hadjer-Lamis is located in the central part of Chad, with a diverse landscape that includes both arid and fertile areas.

Name: Kanem
Description: Kanem is located in the western part of Chad and is known for its arid climate and desert landscape, as well as its proximity to Lake Chad.

Name: Lac
Description: Lac is a region located near Lake Chad, which plays a vital role in the region seconomy and environment. It is an area with rich aquatic resources and agricultural activity.

Name: Logone Occidental
Description: Logone Occidental is located in the southern part of Chad. The region has a more tropical climate and is heavily involved in agriculture and livestock farming.

Name: Logone Oriental
Description: Logone Oriental is located in the southern part of Chad and shares similarities with its western counterpart in terms of agriculture, particularly cotton and maize production.

Name: Mandoul
Description: Mandoul is located in the southern part of Chad and is a region known for its agricultural potential, particularly crops like cotton, corn, and millet.

Name: Moyen-Chari
Description: Moyen-Chari is a region located in the central-south of Chad. It is an agricultural region, and it also has a significant presence of livestock farming.

Name: Ouaddaï
Description: Ouaddaï is located in the eastern part of Chad, known for its dry desert climate and its proximity to Sudan. Agriculture and livestock are important in this region.

Name: Salamat
Description: Salamat is located in the southeastern part of Chad and has a variety of landscapes, including savannas and forests. It is known for agriculture, including cotton and maize.

Name: Sila
Description: Sila is located in the eastern part of Chad, known for its desert landscapes and its proximity to the border with Sudan. The region has agricultural potential in some areas.

Name: Tandjilé
Description: Tandjilé is located in the southwestern part of Chad. It is a region that relies heavily on agriculture and has a more tropical climate.

Name: Tchad
Description: The Tchad region covers the central part of the country and is involved in various economic activities, especially livestock farming and agriculture.
